summary: Craftable and enchantable Nightingale daggers. (No pre-enchantments)
descriptionHtml:
A Nightingale dagger (shortsword) for those sneaky types

[b]Crafting[/b]
Requires:
1 Ebony ingot
1 Leather strips
2 Void Salts
Does not require Ebony Smithing perk

[b]Sharpening[/b]
Makes use of Ebony Smithing perk
Requires: ebony ingot

[b]Enchanting[/b]
It comes with no pre-enchantments and can be enchanted just like any other weapon

[b]Stats[/b]
Base damage: 11
Weight: 6
Speed: 1.3 (like daggers)
Reach: 0.8 (swords have 1.0, other daggers have 0.7)

[b]Animations[/b]
It works like swords. Most people don\'t like dagger animations since it limits DPS.

[b]Compatibility[/b]
It\'s compatible with retextures for the Nightingale Blade
It\'s [b]not[/b] compatible with [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12852]Daggers on pelvis back[/URL]. It\'ll be sheathed just like a sword since it\'s a little bit longer than usual daggers.
It\'s designed to match [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=5247]Sunnie\'s Craftable and Enchantable Nightingale Set[/URL]

[b]Options[/b]
Darker leather sheath is available.

[b]Bugs[/b]
Please report any bugs you encounter since I haven\'t had the time to fully test it.

[b]Installation[/b]
Extract to your Skyrim/Data folder

[b]Uninstallation[/b]
Delete the following files:
Data/meshes/weapons/nightingale/1stpersonnightingaledagger.nif
Data/meshes/weapons/nightingale/nightingaledagger.nif
Data/textures/weapons/nightingale/scabbards.dds
Data/textures/weapons/nightingale/scabbards_n.dds
Data/NightingaleDagger.esp

[b]Looking for a ring to complete your Nightingale set? [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17035]Here[/URL] it is.[/b]
author: dukefx
